page.title: 05Four Lanes Social Concerns.
page.content: One of our concerns is that the village has not got a village hall. It has a church hall but this is quite small, it is very near to the main road so is noisy and dangerous.Until last year it was very cold in there we hope it will be better now. Each year the village held a Gala,there were different activities e.g. Gala Queen, Fairy Queen, dog show, disco. A large marquee was erected for the weeks events and on the Saturday a show of crafts, flowers, vegetables, cakes, plants and hundreds of entries from the village school. Unfortunatly this has stopped this year (1985) due to lack of response from the villagers.Instead we have a Carnival.
